channel.title: Cannons
channel.description:
Current prices -------------- Cannon - 510k Cannonbal - 180 each
Should I buy? Are they still good?

item.title: Cannons
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“FloStateKid, post:10, topic:237042”]Yeah… I mean when I was playing RS2 like 2 years ago i had atleast 85M. That was alot back then… I don’t know if the Economy Value changed in that game… Like for example… when D Boots came out, I bought them right away… for around 4M. Then they dropped drastically…

But even as a wealthy player in that game… I loved Cannons, because it was such an attraction. I always would bother people by setting it in banks and such lmao… Or I would taunt the “noobs”… by Shooting with my cannon at the Guards at varrock*.

they were like 650k at the time. I quit because it was seriously taking my life away… I had full Dragon Armor… All barrows… I was dying…All I would do is work on my house, and give dungeon parties… So I gave my account to a friend. He’s still holding it thank god, so if I ever want to Join back, I will be happy :)[/quote]
no one asked for a life story, although the way its worded it makes it sound as if your lieing through your teeth

Read full topic

item.title: Cannons
item.dc:creator: @FloStateKid FloStateKid
item.description:
@FloStateKid wrote:

Yeah… I mean when I was playing RS2 like 2 years ago i had atleast 85M. That was alot back then… I don’t know if the Economy Value changed in that game… Like for example… when D Boots came out, I bought them right away… for around 4M. Then they dropped drastically…

But even as a wealthy player in that game… I loved Cannons, because it was such an attraction. I always would bother people by setting it in banks and such lmao… Or I would taunt the “noobs”… by Shooting with my cannon at the Guards at varrock*.

they were like 650k at the time. I quit because it was seriously taking my life away… I had full Dragon Armor… All barrows… I was dying…All I would do is work on my house, and give dungeon parties… So I gave my account to a friend. He’s still holding it thank god, so if I ever want to Join back, I will be happy
